Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill will hit a refresh button along with a bunch of IPL performers during the T20 internationals against Zimbabwe.
Two young men, who are lined for debut could be Punjab's Abhishek Sharma and the young Assamese lad Riyan Parag.
All the fresh faces are expected to make their international debut during the series scheduled to be played entirely in the Zimbabwean capital.
Zimbabwe certainly isn't the most formidable opposition but in T20 format, the gulf between sides is comparatively lesser than the other two traditional forms of the game.
The hosts, led by the gutsy Sikandar Raza, could prove to be a handful on nippy afternoons at the Harare Sports Club.
